content: However, as he says that, a pirate ship suddenly floats back up from underwater, now cut in half. The captain of the ship yells at an individual on the mast, bemoaning how he ruined their dream to get to the New World. The said figure is not fazed and just tells him it was their bad luck to meet him. It is then revealed that the person on the mast is none other than Zoro, who grumbles about getting on the wrong ship.
